critique:
They are playing water polo, for clarity.
At least one event was missed: one of the water polo players leaves.

temporal.caption: A large group of people are seen swimming around a pool while a coach yells on the sides.
Shots of people playing are shown when one hits the other.
The coaches yell to one another while people still play the game.

captions.full: A large group of people are seen swimming around a pool while a coach yells on the sides. Shots of people playing are shown when one hits the other. The coaches yell to one another while people still play the game.
